Class IPDatagram

java.lang.Object
  com.larkwoodlabs.util.logging.LoggableBase
      com.larkwoodlabs.net.ip.IPDatagram
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable
public final class IPDatagram
extends LoggableBase

Represents an IP datagram containing a single IP message.

Author:
Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)
